# Flipbook Web App - Project Instructions

This is a complete web application for creating flipbook documents from PDF and video files.

## Project Structure
- Frontend: Next.js with React and Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Express.js API with MongoDB
- Storage: AWS S3 with CloudFront CDN
- Authentication: JWT-based
- PDF Rendering: PDF.js
- Analytics: Custom tracking system

## Completed Steps
- [x] Project scaffolding and structure creation
